subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 25 points as the visiting Liberty took control with a 30-5 first-half run and survived a frantic fourth quarter to beat Washington for their first road victory of the season.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 25 points as the visiting Liberty took control with a 30-5 first-half run and survived a frantic fourth quarter to beat Washington for their first road victory of the season.
